mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEMID AS "item.itemId", I.productId AS "item.productId" , I.categoryId AS "item.categoryId", I.price AS "item.price", I.stock AS "item.stock", I.title AS "item.title", A.sellerId, A.participant, A.deadline, A.auctionId FROM AUCTION A, ITEM I WHERE A.AUCTIONID = I.ITEMID AND A.SELLERID=#{SELLERID}

SELECT I.ITEMID AS "item.itemId", I.productId AS "item.productId" , I.categoryId AS "item.categoryId", I.price AS "item.price", I.stock AS "item.stock", I.title AS "item.title", I.description AS "item.description", A.sellerId, A.participant, A.deadline, A.auctionId FROM AUCTION A, ITEM I WHERE A.AUCTIONID = I.ITEMID AND A.auctionId=#{AUCTIONID}
mapper.update: UPDATE ( SELECT I.ITEMID AS "item.itemId", I.productId AS "item.productId" , I.categoryId AS "item.categoryId", I.price AS "item.price", I.stock AS "item.stock", I.title AS "item.title", I.description AS "item.description", A.sellerId, A.participant, A.deadline, A.auctionId FROM AUCTION A, ITEM I WHERE A.AUCTIONID = I.ITEMID AND A.auctionId=#{AUCTIONID} )SET TITLE = #{item.title}, PRODUCTID = #{item.productId}, STOCK = #{item.stock}, DESCRIPTION = #{item.description}
